System requirements:  


Operating system: Windows XP (SP3) / Vista (SP2) / 7
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 @ 3 GHz / AMD Athlon XP 3200+
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card: nVidia GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon X1800 - 256 MB
Sound device: compatible with DirectX
Free disk space: 12 GB


Game information:  

The Last Remnant - role-playing game in which you will find a radically new
combat system, which you can take part in large-scale battles. Background events
is as follows: a thousand years ago people came into contact with Remnants -
magic representatives of a bygone era, which constantly maintain a balance in
the world. Soon after there has been a rift between the rulers and the ruled
the world, Remnants ceased to perform its task. On those lands where before
there was peace, rivers of blood flowed. After a thousand years after this
and start your adventure ...


Game Features:  

The atmosphere of the world, virtually destroyed by constant war
Detailed location, the beauty of which is provided by the power
of the Unreal Engine 3

Large-scale spectacular battles

Up to 70 different characters in one combat,
creating an atmosphere of truly epic battle.


RePack Features:  

Do not cut / no recoded
The average duration of the installation ~ 15 minutes
RePacked by RG Revenants
